subtitle: welcome to meaningful Monday's where we
answer your personal questions the
question for this week is this I'm an
intern at a high-profile company in an
industry notorious for oversized egos
despite the fact that I'm intelligent
and talented one of my superiors talks
down to me like I'm a little kid and
takes pleasure in it she's rude to me at
every possible opportunity especially in
front of people whom i would like to
impress I entered this internship to get
ahead in my industry after graduating
from college but I really need to
subject myself to such ridicule in order
to succeed and if so how can I deal with
the embarrassment well always know that
you're never a victim of circumstances
we are always in control of our
situation all battles are fought and won
in the mind if you feel you're a victim
if you feel your subject that someone
else's ridicule then you often become
vulnerable to that ridicule so frankly
you really have two ways to deal with
the situation you have to determine
based on the circumstances you can
either completely ignore her attitude
and rise above it always be cordial take
the high road and be different different
without allowing your dignity to be
abused and use your position and your
internship is an opportunity to grow or
option two if you think it would help
approach this woman either formally or
informally be firm but respectful and
asking if you did anything wrong which
deserves this type of attitude of hers
tell that you're totally dedicated to
the job and want to get rid of any bad
blood that may exist so you can work
more efficiently and make her shine
better as well as accomplishing your
potential we are always going to be
faced with people that are rude that are
obnoxious never allow that to get to you
you have to have your core personality a
certain confidence and know that you can
make it through any given situation
never allow someone to get to you if you
feel disturbed by something pause go to
take a walk speak
to a friend never react quickly because
you always want to be in control of your
situation this has been meaningful
Monday's where we address your questions
if you'd like to submit a question
please click on the link below please
like and share everyone have a very
meaningful week
